resource.chars:
Advertisement 

Whereas the publication of these Transactions 
has for some months last past been interrupted,
The Reader is desired to take notice that the care 
of the Edition of this Book of M<sup>r<\sup> Newton, having 
lain wholly upon the publisher (wherin he conceives 
he hath been more serviceable to the Commonwealth 
of Learning) and for some other pressing reasons, they 
could not be got ready in due time: but now they will 
again be continued as formerly, and come out regularly, either 
of 3 sheets or 5 sheets with a Cutt; according as materialls 
shall occurr.
